001.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), stunning empress with alien bioluminescent veins, crown of tendrils, cosmic throne behind, upper half body, elegant posture, cinematic feel, seen through glass or fabric, light distortion, slight smile while looking back over shoulder, background blurred to focus sharply on eyes, colorful light gradient across background,

scenes.text:

002.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, sitting on a wooden chair, crossed legs, relaxed posture, shoulders and head visible, soft lighting, seen through glass or fabric, light distortion, arms crossed lightly, relaxed and confident, face positioned off-center with balanced lighting, face half in soft shadow, delicate contrast,

scenes.text:
成功者は
“努力の影響”を
過大評価している

003.prompt: forest frozen in multiple seasons simultaneously, color distortion everywhere, silhouette in unnatural lighting, distorted horizon, viewed from below with strong tilt, subject placed near frame edge, lying on transparent surface, face to the side, half-framed, composition with no symmetry, elements scattered unevenly, avoids centering, subject leaving motion trail like time echo,

scenes.text: 社会的背景が大きな影響を与えている。
「努力がすべて」と信じてしまうのは、
結果が出た後に過去の行動を美化する

004.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, looking out train window, chin resting on hand, reflective mood, shoulders and head visible, soft lighting, camera angled slightly from above, flattering light, slight smile while looking back over shoulder, blurred object partially in foreground, framing face, emphasis on skin texture like silk, gentle lighting,

scenes.text: 心理作用によるものであることが指摘されている。

005.prompt: rabbit with roots instead of legs, growing moss as it hops, distant shot, tiny subject, wide surreal background, angled view through a broken side window, subject offset and cropped, running motion along slanted ground, angled frame, off-center, motion blur in horizontal pan, subject near far edge of image, subject leaving motion trail like time echo,

scenes.text:
努力を続けても、
環境が悪ければ
成果は出にくい
家庭の経済状況や教育機会の差は、
個人の努力とは無関係に人生の成果に強く影響する。

006.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, modest dress, standing in a quiet hall, poised expression, shoulders and head visible, soft lighting, head slightly tilted toward camera, intimate framing, eyes softly closed, calm or dreamlike atmosphere, intentional asymmetric crop for tension, gentle bokeh in background, soft tones,

scenes.text: 努力しても成果が出ない背景には、
個人ではどうにもならない
構造的な格差があるとされている。

007.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, busty woman in silk robe, hair cascading, laying on bed, sensual expression, tight face crop, expressive eyes, detailed makeup, looking past the camera, not directly at viewer, touching her hair gently, slightly dreamy pose, background blurred to focus sharply on eyes, face half in soft shadow, delicate contrast,

scenes.text:
「成功＝努力の証」
と思うほど、
他人に冷たくなる
「努力すれば報われる」という価値観を
強く持つ人ほど、失敗している人に対して

008.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, modest dress, standing in a quiet hall, poised expression, tight face crop, expressive eyes, detailed makeup, viewed subtly from below, strong presence, touching her hair gently, slightly dreamy pose, light shapes framing the face from side or back, face half in soft shadow, delicate contrast,

scenes.text: 「努力不足」と決めつける傾向がある。
これは社会的弱者への共感や支援意欲を下げ、
格差拡大を容認する心理につながるとされる。
